item.title: Men’s Conference
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Uncommon 2022 is a men’s conference designed to challenge men to chart a course away from the ordinary. We fight to become the men God created us to be, the husbands our wives deserve, and the fathers our kids desperately need. On October 7–8, we’ll be hosting this event at Ekklesia Christian Church in Conway. We had it on our […]
item.content:encoded:
Uncommon 2022 is a men’s conference designed to challenge men to chart a course away from the ordinary. We fight to become the men God created us to be, the husbands our wives deserve, and the fathers our kids desperately need. On October 7–8, we’ll be hosting this event at Ekklesia Christian Church in Conway.

We had it on our hearts to be a blessing to pastors. Do you just need to be poured into? Do you need a spiritual renewal? You are constantly feeding others, but have a hard time getting fed? It would be our pleasure to serve you at this year’s Uncommon Conference. Pastors—simply email tabitha@ekkchurch.com. She’ll get your free registration set up.
